action.action-desc: Mr. Ogles introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To freeze hiring activity for the Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco, Firearms and Explosives and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Forbidding the Increase of Rogue Enforcers Act or the FIRE Act.
Beginning on the date of the enactment of this Actâ€”

paragraph.text: no individual may be appointed to any position within the Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco, Firearms and Explosives;
no new position may be established at the Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco, Firearms and Explosives;
no officer or employee of the Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco, Firearms and Explosives may be assigned any duty not assigned to that officer or employee as of the date of the enactment of this Act; and

no officer or employee of the Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco, Firearms and Explosives may be assigned, detailed, or transferred to a duty station other than the duty station of such officer or employee as of the date of the enactment of this Act.
